definitions.definition: A person or thing that specifies .
A component of a phrase that is non-recursive and not found as a sister of the head of the phrase, but rather as a daughter of the maximal projection of the phrase.

main_definition: A person or thing that specifies .
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A component of a phrase that is non-recursive and not found as a sister of the head of the phrase, but rather as a daughter of the maximal projection of the phrase.
